      • loadSpritesheet

        public static Spritesheet loadSpritesheet​(java.lang.String path,
                                          int spriteWidth,
                                          int spriteHeight,
                                          int numSprites,
                                          int spacing)
        Loads a image from the filesystem, and returns a Spritesheet object.
        Parameters:
        path - to Texture resource (usually a .png file)
        width - of each sprite
        height - of each sprite
        number - of sprites in the sheet
        pixel - spacing between sprites (0 if no spacing)
        Returns:
        returns type Spritesheet
